Post: "Nobody loves me on Twitter. I guess that means I'm just unlovable and will never have meaningful relationships in my life."

Post: "The water in the shower at the campsite smelled nasty; I guess this whole trip is going to be a disaster and nothing will go right for me."

Post: "I lost my right to vote, which means I'm probably going to be powerless and irrelevant in every aspect of my life, from getting the job I want to being respected by others."

Post: "I feel so sad right now, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life."

"Missing each other means we're probably going to be disconnected in every aspect of our lives, and I'll never find someone who truly understands me."
